statements: SELECT * FROM market_data;
SELECT symbol, date, close_price FROM market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, date, open_price, close_price FROM market_data WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT symbol, high_price, low_price FROM market_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, close_price FROM market_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT symbol, date, open_price, close_price FROM market_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT symbol, high_price, low_price FROM market_data WHERE open_price > 100 ORDER BY high_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT symbol, MIN(low_price), MAX(high_price) FROM market_data GROUP BY symbol HAVING MAX(high_price) > 200;
SELECT symbol, DATE(date) AS trading_date, close_price FROM market_data WHERE symbol IN ('AAPL', 'MSFT') ORDER BY trading_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, date, close_price FROM historical_market_data WHERE close_price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, date, open_price, close_price FROM historical_market_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT id, symbol, date, sentiment FROM trend_analysis WHERE sentiment = 'positive' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, date, trend FROM trend_analysis WHERE sentiment = 'negative' ORDER BY symbol ASC, date DESC;
SELECT id, symbol, date, open_price, close_price FROM historical_market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT symbol, close_price, volume FROM historical_market_data WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY close_price DESC;
SELECT symbol, trend, sentiment FROM trend_analysis WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY date ASC, symbol DESC;
SELECT AVG(open_price) AS avg_open_price, MAX(close_price) AS max_close_price FROM historical_market_data WHERE symbol IN ('AAPL', 'GOOGL');
SELECT symbol, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM historical_market_data GROUP BY symbol HAVING COUNT(*) >= 100 ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, open, close FROM market_data WHERE date = '2022-01-10';
SELECT symbol, date, high FROM market_data ORDER BY high DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT analyst_name, rating FROM analyst_ratings WHERE symbol = 'GOOG' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT date, headline FROM stock_news WHERE content LIKE '%technology%' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT symbol, date, open, close FROM market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT symbol, close, open, high, low, date FROM market_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-01-31' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT symbol, date, rating FROM analyst_ratings WHERE analyst_name = 'John Doe' AND rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC, date ASC
SELECT date, headline FROM stock_news WHERE headline LIKE '%earnings%' AND date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date ASC

SELECT symbol, date, open, close, high, low FROM market_data INNER JOIN analyst_ratings ON market_data.symbol = analyst_ratings.symbol WHERE analyst_ratings.rating = 5 AND market_data.close > market_data.open
SELECT * FROM MarketData;
SELECT symbol, close, volume FROM MarketData WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT symbol, date, rating FROM AnalystRatings WHERE rating = 'Buy' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, sector, industry FROM CompanyInfo WHERE sector = 'Technology';
SELECT symbol, shares, purchase_price FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE shares > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_price ASC;
SELECT symbol, date, high, low FROM MarketData WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT company_name, sector, industry FROM CompanyInfo WHERE sector = 'Technology' ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT symbol, rating, date FROM AnalystRatings WHERE rating = 'Buy' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentPortfolio WHERE shares > 100 ORDER BY purchase_price ASC;

SELECT MarketData.symbol, MarketData.close, InvestmentPortfolio.shares FROM MarketData INNER JOIN InvestmentPortfolio ON MarketData.symbol = InvestmentPortfolio.symbol ORDER BY MarketData.close DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM historical_prices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT symbol, date, close_price FROM historical_prices WHERE date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT symbol, high_price, low_price FROM historical_prices WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT symbol, open_price, close_price, date FROM historical_prices WHERE symbol = 'MSFT' LIMIT 10;
SELECT symbol, AVG(close_price) AS avg_close_price FROM historical_prices GROUP BY symbol;
SELECT symbol, date, open_price, close_price FROM historical_prices LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM stock_information WHERE sector = 'Technology' ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT symbol, MAX(high_price) AS highest_price FROM historical_prices GROUP BY symbol;
SELECT date, SUM(volume) AS total_volume FROM trade_volume GROUP BY date ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE trend_id = 3;
